short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limitless to Pipedrive developed by Limitless Digital Ltd. http://www.limitless.agency - simon@limitless.agency

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to move data to Pipedrive from LI, then this is the extension for you.

When you installed you can click the little P logo inside a message in LI and it will create a deal in Pipedrive - bringing the customers details across from LI for you.

More information and learn how to use the extension contact - simon@limitless.agency
